Doc: A structure to specify the tranmission contingency and the party that bears the obligation.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A structure to specify the tranmission contingency and the party that bears the obligation.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.ElectricityTransmissionContingency {
  # The conditions under which the party specified in contingentParty will be excused from damages if transmission is interrupted or curtailed.
  contingency : string?

  # The party to which the contingency applies.
  contingentParty : FpML5.recordkeeping.PartyReference?

}

contingency.Doc: The conditions under which the party specified in contingentParty will be excused from damages if transmission is interrupted or curtailed.
contingency.Name: contingency

contingentParty.Doc: The party to which the contingency applies.
contingentParty.Name: contingentParty
